programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU faces the fury of social media fans when they arrest two popular influencer brothers.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a teenage sex worker disappears, Rollins and Velasco find a key clue in a pile of neglected missing persons reports.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Carisi asks the SVU for help with a murder investigation when one of the witnesses shows signs of abuse.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A young woman learning about her birth parents asks Benson for help; Carisi and Rollins weigh the risks of taking their relationship public.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The creator of a dating app is accused of using it to rape women; Velasco's experience as an SVU detective is put on trial.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Velasco asks Benson for help finding three girls who were trafficked from his hometown to New York City.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and the team investigate a father's murder after his teenage daughters call in a home burglary that turns into an attempted assault; when the team speaks with the medical examiner, the details don't add up.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson, Fin, Carisi and Rollins debate what they should and should not conjecture about a defendant's situation while waiting to testify at her murder trial.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and the team investigate the death of a prostitute at a brothel; they wonder if there was foul play or if this could be a case of a junkie who relapsed, turned to tricking, got depressed and committed suicide.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and Rollins must contend with the FBI and the Organized Crime bureau when a rape victim identifies a dangerous mobster as her assailant.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a young woman accuses a celebrity plastic surgeon and his girlfriend of sexual assault, Benson and the team must determine if the woman was attacked or if it was a night of sex games gone wrong.

programme.title: The Rainmaker
programme.desc: As Rudy and Deck search for a missing nurse, their investigation suggests a dark conspiracy at play.

programme.desc: Stateside Premier League fan festival that includes a turf pitch, the Premier League trophy, club mascots, special guests, contests, and more.

programme.title: Live: NASCAR Cup Series Countdown to Green
programme.desc: Pre-race show with analysis, driver profiles, reports from the garage, interviews with drivers and crew chiefs, and more.

programme.title: Live: NASCAR Cup Series
programme.desc: The NASCAR Cup Series Round of 16 gets underway with the Cook Out Southern 500 from Darlington Raceway. Ryan Blaney won in a photo-finish during the regular-season finale at Daytona, while Alex Bowman grabbed the 16th and final playoff spot.

programme.title: Live: NASCAR Cup Series Post Race
programme.desc: Post race coverage from the latest Cup event.

programme.title: The Rainmaker
programme.desc: As Rudy and Deck search for a missing nurse, their investigation suggests a dark conspiracy at play.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Rollins and Fin investigate an assault in Kentucky that has striking similarities to that of a victim found in Central Park; Benson receives intel that turns the case upside down.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Garland asks Benson to reopen a missing persons case he worked as a rookie officer; a victim in one of Carisi's recent cases is arrested.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When the only evidence in a crime is a church confession, Carisi must find another way to prove his suspect guilty; Benson agrees to meet with an old friend seeking to make amends for past transgressions.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A decade old case reopens, and a few seconds of a 911 call enable investigators to determine who is responsible for a murder.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Benson and the SVU investigate the death of a man they believe to be a pedophile; when they dig deeper, they realize things are not what they seem and that the case actually hits really close to home.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU pursues a suspect when a child is discovered in the trunk of an abandoned car.
